title: How to Make a Sydney Fizz

steps.headline: Put the ice cubes into a cocktail shaker.
Pour the orange, lemon juices, grenadine and gin over the ice cubes.
Pop the lid onto your cocktail shaker then shake vigorously to combine the ingredients.
Strain the mixed liquids into a glass.
Add a small slice of orange or lemon to the rim of the glass and serve.

text: Put the ice cubes into a cocktail shaker.  Pour the orange, lemon juices, grenadine and gin over the ice cubes.  Pop the lid onto your cocktail shaker then shake vigorously to combine the ingredients.  Strain the mixed liquids into a glass.  Top up with soda water.  Add a small slice of orange or lemon to the rim of the glass and serve.
